meaningMnemonic: You have a <kanji>small</kanji> <kanji>plate</kanji>. Wait, is that it? Yep, that's it.
readingMnemonic: さら uses the same reading as the one you learned with the kanji, except it's ざら this time because of the rendaku. 小 uses an alternate kun'yomi reading. You can remember it by thinking "What are small? Kids (子) are small. Bwahaha."
